A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A 7 year old that became a star wars fan in 1977 to a 46 year old wondering if everything star wars influenced me with was a facade. Things need to change with time understandably but respect the heroes that created this great ambition fans hold onto. Feels like everything I loved about star wars got thrown over Disney's shoulder. I will still always feel lucky enough to have witnessed episodes 4\, 5 and 6 in my influencing part of my life.
